unnormalised: Market buzz is all about Paytm stocks, bhai! Seems like they're finally catching some good vibes. Today, Paytm shares saw a jump of 5%, hitting ₹850 apiece on the NSE. Analysts are saying this surge is thanks to the positive outlook after their last earnings report.
normalised: Market buzz is all about Paytm stocks, brother! Seems like they are finally catching some good vibes. Today, Paytm shares saw a jump of five percent, hitting rupee eight hundred and fifty apiece on the N-S-E. Analysts are saying this surge is thanks to the positive outlook after their last earnings report.

unnormalised: Investors are keeping a close watch, especially after that dip to ₹600 a few months back. Should you invest? Well, that’s the million-dollar question! Experts suggest doing your homework and not just jumping on the bandwagon. Remember that friend Ramesh who lost a lakh investing without research? Don't be like Ramesh!
normalised: Investors are keeping a close watch, especially after that dip to rupee six hundred a few months back. Should you invest? Well, that is the million dollar question! Experts suggest doing your homework and not just jumping on the bandwagon. Remember that friend Ramesh who lost a lakh investing without research? Do not be like Ramesh!

unnormalised: So, keep an eye on those charts and maybe consult a financial advisor before diving in. Is this the start of Paytm’s comeback story? Only time will tell, but for now, the bulls seem to be having a field day!
normalised: So, keep an eye on those charts and maybe consult a financial advisor before diving in. Is this the start of Paytm's comeback story? Only time will tell, but for now, the bulls seem to be having a field day!
